title: Obstruction to driver's view or driving mechanism
context: ยง291C-124 Obstruction to driver&rsquo;s view or driving mechanism. (a) No person shall drive a vehicle when it is so loaded, or when there are in the front seat such a number of persons, exceeding three, as to obstruct the view of the driver to the front or sides of the vehicle, or as to interfere with the driver&rsquo;s control over the driving mechanism of the vehicle. (b) While operating a motor vehicle, no person shall hold in the person&rsquo;s lap, or allow to be in the driver&rsquo;s immediate area, any person, animal, or object which interferes with the driver&rsquo;s control over the driving mechanism of the vehicle. &copy; No passenger in a vehicle shall ride in such position as to interfere with the driver&rsquo;s view ahead or to the sides, or to interfere with the driver&rsquo;s control over the driving mechanism of the vehicle. [L 1971, c 150, pt of ยง1; am L 1981, c 11, ยง1; gen ch 1985]
